text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Today's training is “Daruma-san ga koronda”! The distance to the school gate will be longer than the last timeー

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Question…! Can I say something!?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: We did unicycle and now we are doing Daruma-san ga koronda… Is it okay to just practice like playing!?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Practice is really fun! I wonder if we don't have to do muscle training the normal way.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What is this, so you want some more stimulation? I got then I will raise the level as you want!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! For our cute juniors, let this class president take off!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alright! Just wait a bit!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ーWith that said. We called everyone from the team !

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Right, I brought the rest from team !

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's get started! 3 team joint practice “Runaway win and Onigokko”!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Those caught by oni will become oni, and those caught will become escapes. At the end of the time limit, the runner is the winner!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Is the content always the same even in joint practice～!?
Then, the Onigokko joint practice beganー

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew… I wonder if I finally got away… Let's take a break…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Bright-san, was chasing me the whole time… Doto-chan was beside her so why didn't she go after her…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Ah… Oh… I finally caught up with you～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, touch～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, no way!? And you're already running away!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Opera O-chan! Why are you running side-by-side with me from a while ago!? If you reach out to me, you can do it, right!?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: I won't be in the palm of your hands! The moment I reach out, won't you speed up?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry to end this deal!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I've been read… Besides, Opera O-chan can still keep going…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Then, I'll push forward here!!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: I won't let you do that!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Oh, I've been dodged. You're pretty nimble, Kita-chan.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Heh, heh… Geez, It's taking all I got!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: No, you have the endurance to be able to keep running for this long. Besides… you can unexpectedly keep track of your surroundings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I wonder if you were doing some complex training? I want you to tell me about it… later!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is the end of joint practice! Thank you for your cooperation, everyone, from the teams and !

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Same to you, thank you for inviting us! It was fun!! From tomorrow, I will be able to practice with a new feeling.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: If you only practice regularly, your field of vision tends to narrow! In that sense, we had a good opportunity!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: …What's wrong, Kita-chan?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …The practices we have done so far may have been meaningful.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Today, I was praised by Ryan-san at the Onigokko! I thought it was thanks to the team practice!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Mm, I also feel the results of the practice. The seniors are reliable.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Right!! That's reassuring!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ーSo, I thought about a training menu to overcome everyone's challenges that I found out in joint practice!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Woah…! I see, to use your legs for a long time, you need to use those muscles… This will be very helpful!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Then, let's start with the menu that everyone has in common!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooh! This is tough～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah… my thighs are plump… I feel it working～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You can do it Bright! Go at your own pace!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Yes…! Ah… ah…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: …Huh… Bright-san's machine settings, maybe the load is gradually increasing…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah? Speaking of which, it felt like the pedal was heavier than the beginning…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I thought she'd worn pressurized clothing, to try to get into the spirit, but… this is…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Bright-san, don't force yourself if it gets too tough!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for taking it slow～… But, this is still the beginning…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: From tomorrow onward, we are planning to extend the time for one set… So we have to steadily achieve our goals every day…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: It's okay, If it's Bright then she can do it! All right, Then I'll add another set to myself!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Those two are amazing…! Tannhauser-san! Let's do our best too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright… physically I can still go… Starting from today, adding 10 more lapsー

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: …Even so… It's still not enough, right…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan and Bright-san are doing that much. If I do not do more than that, I will get left behind…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm… if there was a way to improve the training effect, like Bright-san's pressurized clothes…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: …That's right! The super drink I saw at Umatta the other day…! If you drink it before training, it is more effective than protein…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ーLet's make one!! I have to do whatever I can!
